component.name: docling
component.title: Docling
component.description: Process documents using Docling library for parsing and conversion.
component.label: transformation,ai

configuration.description: The configuration for the Docling Endpoint

contentInBody.description: Include the content of the output file in the exchange body and delete the output file

enableOCR.description: Enable OCR processing for scanned documents

includeLayoutInfo.description: Show layout information with bounding boxes

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

useDoclingServe.description: Use docling-serve API instead of CLI command

asyncPollInterval.label: advanced
asyncPollInterval.description: Polling interval for async conversion status in milliseconds

asyncTimeout.label: advanced
asyncTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for async conversion completion in milliseconds

autowiredEnabled.label: advanced
autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

connectionRequestTimeout.label: advanced
connectionRequestTimeout.description: Connection request timeout in milliseconds (timeout when requesting connection from pool)

connectionTimeToLive.label: advanced
connectionTimeToLive.description: Time to live for connections in milliseconds (-1 for infinite)

doclingCommand.label: advanced
doclingCommand.description: Path to Docling Python executable or command

evictIdleConnections.label: advanced
evictIdleConnections.description: Enable eviction of idle connections from the pool

maxConnectionsPerRoute.label: advanced
maxConnectionsPerRoute.description: Maximum connections per route in the connection pool

maxIdleTime.label: advanced
maxIdleTime.description: Maximum idle time for connections in milliseconds before eviction

maxTotalConnections.label: advanced
maxTotalConnections.description: Maximum total connections in the connection pool

processTimeout.label: advanced
processTimeout.description: Timeout for Docling process execution in milliseconds

useAsyncMode.label: advanced
useAsyncMode.description: Use asynchronous conversion mode (docling-serve API only)

validateAfterInactivity.label: advanced
validateAfterInactivity.description: Validate connections after inactivity in milliseconds

batchFailOnFirstError.label: batch
batchFailOnFirstError.description: Fail entire batch on first error (true) or continue processing remaining documents (false)

batchParallelism.label: batch
batchParallelism.description: Number of parallel threads for batch processing

batchSize.label: batch
batchSize.description: Maximum number of documents to process in a single batch (batch operations only)

batchTimeout.label: batch
batchTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for batch completion in milliseconds

splitBatchResults.label: batch
splitBatchResults.description: Split batch results into individual exchanges (one per document) instead of single BatchProcessingResults

extractAllMetadata.label: metadata
extractAllMetadata.description: Extract all available metadata fields including custom/raw fields

includeMetadataInHeaders.label: metadata
includeMetadataInHeaders.description: Include metadata in message headers when extracting metadata

includeRawMetadata.label: metadata
includeRawMetadata.description: Include raw metadata as returned by the parser

apiKeyHeader.label: security
apiKeyHeader.description: Header name for API key authentication

authenticationToken.label: security
authenticationToken.description: Authentication token for docling-serve API (Bearer token or API key)

maxFileSize.label: security
maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for processing

CamelDoclingInputFilePath.description: The input file path or content

CamelDoclingOutputFilePath.description: The output file path for saving result

CamelDoclingCustomArguments.description: Custom command line arguments to pass to Docling

CamelDoclingUseAsyncMode.description: Use asynchronous conversion mode (overrides endpoint configuration)

CamelDoclingAsyncPollInterval.description: Polling interval for async conversion status in milliseconds

CamelDoclingAsyncTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for async conversion completion in milliseconds

CamelDoclingTaskId.description: Task ID for checking async conversion status

CamelDoclingBatchSize.description: Override batch size for this operation

CamelDoclingBatchParallelism.description: Override batch parallelism for this operation

CamelDoclingBatchFailOnFirstError.description: Override batch fail on first error setting for this operation

CamelDoclingBatchTimeout.description: Override batch timeout for this operation in milliseconds

CamelDoclingBatchTotalDocuments.description: Total number of documents in the batch

CamelDoclingBatchSuccessCount.description: Number of successfully processed documents in the batch

CamelDoclingBatchFailureCount.description: Number of failed documents in the batch

CamelDoclingBatchProcessingTime.description: Total processing time for the batch in milliseconds

CamelDoclingBatchSplitResults.description: Split batch results into individual exchanges instead of single BatchProcessingResults

CamelDoclingMetadataPageCount.description: Number of pages in the document

CamelDoclingMetadataCustom.description: Custom metadata fields as a Map

CamelDoclingMetadataRaw.description: Raw metadata fields as a Map
